timeline.message:
dotCMS/core#18419 QA feedback (#18624)

* #18419 add exception to util and servlet

* #18419 IT

* #18419 IT
dotCMS/core#18588 Need a scroll bar on content types portlet
dotCMS/core#18496 Fix double insert with double click (#18628)
#18616 this preserves the inode when converting a relationship

Issue 18616 save relationship inode for release 5.3.2 (#18650)

* #18616 this preserves the inode when converting a relationship

* #18616 Fixing some ITs

Co-authored-by: Will Ezell <will@dotcms.com>
Co-authored-by: Nollymar Longa <>

Issue 18640 drop functionissue (#18647)

* adding a test to the main suite

* #18640 the drop function now receives the parameters

Additional fix for 18525 (#18648)

* #18525 Fixing issue that prevented archived related content being retrieved. This change only affects legacy relationship

* #18525 Fixing JS error that prevented legacy relationships being rendered in Edit Contentlet portlet

* #18525 Removing unnecessary set of inode. Code review suggestion

Co-authored-by: Nollymar Longa <>
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/dotCMS/core into release-5.3.2
Merge branch 'release-5.3.2' of https://github.com/dotCMS/core into release-5.3.2

timeline.bodyText: Issue found: A catch statement that catches an exception only to rethrow it should be avoided.
timeline.author: dev-dotcms
